Crafts and artisan products.description: Batik, woodcarving, tie-dye, jewelry - Visual products sold via social media
Crafts and artisan products.rationale: Visual products sold primarily via Instagram/Facebook. Photos ARE the product showcase.

Fashion & Design.description: Fashion, clothing, design - Visual storytelling with moderate e-commerce
Fashion & Design.rationale: Similar to crafts but higher digital sales (online ordering more common) and website (sizing/customization info).

Performing and visual arts.description: Theater, dance, galleries, artists - Event promotion via social
Performing and visual arts.rationale: Social media for event promotion and showcasing work. Platform integration slightly higher (event listings).

Audiovisual (film, photography, TV, vide.rationale: Visual content is CRITICAL (portfolio). Website important for detailed service info. Discoverability higher than other creative (searched by businesses).

Marketing/advertising/publishing.rationale: Website critical (showcase work, case studies). Professional digital presence expected. Discoverability important for B2B.

Festivals and cultural events.description: Music festivals, cultural events, event organizers
Festivals and cultural events.rationale: Social media dominates (event promotion, engagement). Discoverability important (people search for events). Lower visual weight (event photos vs product photos).

Cultural heritage sites/museums.rationale: Discoverability critical (tourists search for attractions). Platform integration important (listed on TripAdvisor, tourism sites). Lower sales weight (mostly entry fees).

Tour Operators.description: Tourism operators - Discoverability & booking capability focused
Tour Operators.rationale: Tour operators depend on discoverability (tourists search online) and booking capabilities. Website serves as primary information source. Digital sales essential as tourists expect to book/pay online.

default_weights.description: Used if sector not specified or doesn't match above

survey_scoring.note: Survey provides internal perspective. External score (0-70) is primary metric.
